css.editor: .red-graphite{color:#545454}.red-graphite a{color:#de4751}.red-graphite blockquote{color:#333}.red-graphite hr{background-color:#dedede}.red-graphite .cell.inEditMode{border-color:#dedede;max-width:700px;margin:0 auto}.red-graphite .text-cell table,.red-graphite .text-cell table th,.red-graphite .text-cell table td{border:1px solid #dedede !important;}.red-graphite .text-cell,.red-graphite .latex-cell .editor{font-size:18px;line-height:1.6;font-family:'Avenir Next';max-width:700px;margin:0 auto;background-color:#fbfbfb;}.red-graphite .code-cell .editor,.red-graphite .markdown-cell .ace_editor{font-size:16px;line-height:1.6;max-width:700px;margin:0 auto}body{font-family:'Avenir Next'}.red-graphite .markdown-cell .ace_markup.ace_heading.ace_1,.red-graphite .markdown-cell .ace_markup.ace_heading.ace_2,.red-graphite .markdown-cell .ace_markup.ace_heading.ace_3,.red-graphite .markdown-cell .ace_markup.ace_heading.ace_4,.red-graphite .markdown-cell .ace_markup.ace_heading.ace_5,.red-graphite .markdown-cell .ace_markup.ace_heading.ace_6{color:#de4751!important}.red-graphite .markdown-cell .ace_heading,.red-graphite .markdown-cell .ace_string.ace_strong{color:#333!important;font-weight:bold}.red-graphite .markdown-cell .ace_line,.red-graphite .markdown-cell .ace_support.ace_function,.red-graphite .markdown-cell .ace_string.ace_emphasis,.red-graphite .markdown-cell .ace_list,.red-graphite .markdown-cell .ace_string.ace_blockquote,.red-graphite .markdown-cell .ace_constant.ace_language.ace_escape{color:#545454!important}.red-graphite #tag-field{margin:8px 2px;}.red-graphite #tag-field .tag{background:#fbfbfb;border-radius:1px;color:#ccc;border:1px solid #dedede}.red-graphite #titlearea{border:none}
css.preview: .red-graphite{color:#545454}.red-graphite a{color:#de4751}.red-graphite table tr{background-color:#fbfbfb}.red-graphite table tr:nth-child(odd){background-color:#efefef}.red-graphite table th{background:#fbfbfb}.red-graphite table td,.red-graphite table th{border-color:#dedede}.red-graphite blockquote{color:#333;border-color:#de4751}.red-graphite hr{background-color:#dedede}.red-graphite code{font-size:16px}.red-graphite .text-cell [style]{background-color:transparent!important}.red-graphite .text-cell,.red-graphite .diagram-cell,.red-graphite .latex-cell,.red-graphite .markdown-cell{font-size:18px;line-height:1.6;font-family:'Avenir Next';max-width:700px;margin:0 auto}.red-graphite .code-cell{font-size:16px;line-height:1.6;max-width:700px;margin:0 auto}.red-graphite .markdown-cell .ace_line{font-size:16px;}.red-graphite #tag-field{margin:8px 2px;}.red-graphite #tag-field .tag{background:#fbfbfb;border-radius:1px;color:#ccc;border:1px solid #dedede}body{font-family:'Avenir Next'}.red-graphite #titlearea{border:none}
css.presentation: .red-graphite{color:#545454}.red-graphite a{color:#de4751}.red-graphite table tr{background-color:#fbfbfb}.red-graphite table tr:nth-child(odd){background-color:#efefef}.red-graphite table th{background:#fbfbfb}.red-graphite table td,.red-graphite table th{border-color:#dedede}.red-graphite blockquote{color:#333;border-color:#de4751}.red-graphite hr{background-color:#dedede}.red-graphite .text-cell,.red-graphite .markdown-cell,.red-graphite .latex-cell{font-size:22px;line-height:1.6;font-family:'Avenir Next';max-width:75%;margin:0 auto;background-color:#fbfbfb;}.red-graphite .code-cell{font-size:20px;line-height:1.6;max-width:75%;margin:0 auto}body{font-family:'Avenir Next'}
